New Records: The Pittsburgh Pirates have hit 137 home runs this season, the fifth-lowest total in MLB play.

Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates are slight favorites with odds of -142, while the Nationals are underdogs with odds of +120.
The game is expected to be a competitive matchup between two teams with contrasting performances this season.
